mng: unexpectedly, actually, to go so far as to, indeed

exm.mng: unexpectedly, to one's surprise, in spite of everything, in that crazy way, actually, to go as far as to
to go to the bottom of a matter, after all, when all is said and done, (in an interrogative sentence) finally, outcome, result
after all, all in all, when all is said and done, in the final analysis
a really determined person will find a solution (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way
exm.pyn: yǒu zhì zhě shì jìng chéng

exm.mng: Jingling, former name of Tianmen 天門|天门, Hubei
persevere and you will succeed (idiom); where there's a will, there's a way

exm.pyn: jiào shòu bì jìng shì jiào shòu
